1.0.name: wordpress/quotes-everywhere
1.0.description: Every Wordpress user knows the 'Hello Dolly' plugin. Ever wondered how you got your own favorite song lyrics, or inspirational quotes anywhere on your site? Great! Welcome to 'Quotes Everywhere!', it's like 'Hello Dolly', but with your own quotes, everywhere where you want, and way more customisable! This plugin could not have been created without 'Hello Dolly' plugin. Created by Sam Simons.
